title: Travel through the Mountain Pass
content:
Travel through the Mountain Pass Type Quest Act Act I Location ROSYMORN MONASTERY Reward

Travel through the Mountain Pass

Travel through the Mountain Pass is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Travel through the Mountain Pass can be acquired during Act I and is a part of the Main Quest: Travel to Moonrise Towers. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3 and earn more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Travel through the Mountain Pass
